name: dispatch-and-delivery-root
description: Dispatch and Delivery Application - Full Stack

scripts.predev: npm run setup:check && npm run setup:docker
scripts.setup: npm run setup:install && npm run setup:docker
scripts.setup:check: node -e "console.log('\x1b[36m%s\x1b[0m', 'üöÄ Starting Dispatch & Delivery Application...'); console.log('\x1b[33m%s\x1b[0m', 'This will:'); console.log('  ‚úÖ Check & start PostgreSQL & Redis'); console.log('  ‚úÖ Start Spring Boot backend (port 8080)'); console.log('  ‚úÖ Start React frontend (port 5173)'); console.log('  ‚úÖ Initialize 12 sample orders & routes'); console.log('');"
scripts.docker:postgres: docker run --name postgres-dispatch -e POSTGRES_DB=dispatch_delivery -e POSTGRES_USER=user -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password -p 5432:5432 -d postgres:latest
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:remove && npm run docker:start
scripts.verify: npm run verify:postgres && npm run verify:redis
scripts.verify:postgres: docker exec postgres-dispatch psql -U user -d dispatch_delivery -c "SELECT id, status, from_address FROM orders LIMIT 5;"
scripts.verify:redis: docker exec redis-dispatch redis-cli KEYS routes:*
scripts.logs:backend: echo 'Check the terminal window running the backend'
scripts.clean: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:remove
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run dev
scripts.info: node -e "console.log('\x1b[36m%s\x1b[0m', 'üì¶ Dispatch & Delivery - Available Commands:'); console.log(''); console.log('\x1b[33m%s\x1b[0m', 'üöÄ Development:'); console.log('  npm run dev          - Start everything (Docker + Backend + Frontend)'); console.log('  npm run dev:backend  - Start backend only'); console.log('  npm run dev:frontend - Start frontend only'); console.log(''); console.log('\x1b[33m%s\x1b[0m', 'üê≥ Docker Management:'); console.log('  npm run docker:start   - Start Docker containers'); console.log('  npm run docker:stop    - Stop containers'); console.log('  npm run docker:restart - Restart containers'); console.log('  npm run docker:status  - Check status'); console.log('  npm run docker:logs    - View all logs'); console.log(''); console.log('\x1b[33m%s\x1b[0m', '‚úÖ Verification:'); console.log('  npm run verify         - Verify data in both databases'); console.log('  npm run verify:postgres - Check PostgreSQL data'); console.log('  npm run verify:redis   - Check Redis data'); console.log(''); console.log('\x1b[33m%s\x1b[0m', 'üßπ Cleanup:'); console.log('  npm run clean  - Stop and remove containers'); console.log('  npm run reset  - Clean and restart everything'); console.log('');"
